Planetary Orbital Evolution due to Tides
Orbital evolution of two objects experiencing tides

12 
13  void StopHistoryInterval::advance_iterator_set(
14  std::list<double>::const_iterator &age_i,
15  std::list< std::valarray<double> >::const_iterator &cond_i,
16  std::list< std::valarray<double> >::const_iterator &deriv_i)
17  {
18  ++age_i; ++cond_i; ++deriv_i;
19  if(age_i == __history_age_end) {
20  assert(cond_i == __stop_cond_history_end
21  &&
22  deriv_i == __stop_deriv_history_end);
23  age_i = __discarded_age_begin;
24  cond_i = __stop_cond_discarded_begin;
25  deriv_i = __stop_deriv_discarded_begin;
26  }
27  }
28 
29  void StopHistoryInterval::retreat_iterator_set(
30  std::list<double>::const_iterator &age_i,
31  std::list< std::valarray<double> >::const_iterator &cond_i,
32  std::list< std::valarray<double> >::const_iterator &deriv_i)
33  {
34  if(age_i == __discarded_age_begin) {
35  assert(cond_i == __stop_cond_discarded_begin
36  &&
37  deriv_i == __stop_deriv_discarded_begin);
38  age_i = __history_age_end;
39  cond_i = __stop_cond_history_end;
40  deriv_i = __stop_deriv_history_end;
41  }
42  --age_i; --cond_i; --deriv_i;
43  }
44 
45  StopHistoryInterval::StopHistoryInterval(
46  size_t num_points,
47  std::list<double>::const_iterator first_age,
48  std::list<double>::const_iterator history_age_end,
49  std::list<double>::const_iterator discarded_age_begin,
50  std::list< std::valarray<double> >::const_iterator first_stop_cond,
51  std::list< std::valarray<double> >::const_iterator
52  stop_cond_history_end,
53  std::list< std::valarray<double> >::const_iterator
54  stop_cond_discarded_begin,
55  std::list< std::valarray<double> >::const_iterator first_stop_deriv,
56  std::list< std::valarray<double> >::const_iterator
57  stop_deriv_history_end,
58  std::list< std::valarray<double> >::const_iterator
59  stop_deriv_discarded_begin
60  ) :
61  __num_points(num_points),
62  __point_i(0),
63  __first_age(first_age),
64  __last_age(first_age),
65  __history_age_end(history_age_end),
66  __discarded_age_begin(discarded_age_begin),
67  __age_i(first_age),
68  __first_stop_cond(first_stop_cond),
69  __last_stop_cond(first_stop_cond),
70  __stop_cond_history_end(stop_cond_history_end),
71  __stop_cond_discarded_begin(stop_cond_discarded_begin),
72  __stop_cond_i(first_stop_cond),
73  __first_stop_deriv(first_stop_deriv),
74  __last_stop_deriv(first_stop_deriv),
75  __stop_deriv_history_end(stop_deriv_history_end),
76  __stop_deriv_discarded_begin(stop_deriv_discarded_begin),
77  __stop_deriv_i(first_stop_deriv)
78  {
79  if(num_points == 0)
80  throw Core::Error::BadFunctionArguments(
81  "Attempt to contsruct a StopHistoryInterval of size 0."
82  );
83  for(size_t i = 0; i < num_points - 1; i++)
84  advance_iterator_set(__last_age,
85  __last_stop_cond,
86  __last_stop_deriv);
87  reset();
88  }
89 
90  StopHistoryInterval::StopHistoryInterval(const StopHistoryInterval &orig) :
91  __num_points(orig.__num_points),
92  __point_i(orig.__point_i),
93  __first_age(orig.__first_age),
94  __last_age(orig.__last_age),
95  __history_age_end(orig.__history_age_end),
96  __discarded_age_begin(orig.__discarded_age_begin),
97  __age_i(orig.__age_i),
98  __first_stop_cond(orig.__first_stop_cond),
99  __last_stop_cond(orig.__last_stop_cond),
100  __stop_cond_history_end(orig.__stop_cond_history_end),
101  __stop_cond_discarded_begin(orig.__stop_cond_discarded_begin),
102  __stop_cond_i(orig.__stop_cond_i),
103  __first_stop_deriv(orig.__first_stop_deriv),
104  __last_stop_deriv(orig.__last_stop_deriv),
105  __stop_deriv_history_end(orig.__stop_deriv_history_end),
106  __stop_deriv_discarded_begin(orig.__stop_deriv_discarded_begin),
107  __stop_deriv_i(orig.__stop_deriv_i)
108  {}
109 
110  void StopHistoryInterval::reset()
111  {
112  __point_i = 0;
113  __age_i = __first_age;
114  __stop_cond_i = __first_stop_cond;
115  __stop_deriv_i = __first_stop_deriv;
116  }
117 
118  StopHistoryInterval &StopHistoryInterval::operator++()
119  {
120  ++__point_i;
121  if(__point_i>__num_points)
122  throw Core::Error::Runtime(
123  "Attempting to increment two points past the end of a "
124  "StopHistoryInterval!"
125  );
126  advance_iterator_set(__age_i, __stop_cond_i, __stop_deriv_i);
127  return *this;
128  }
129 
130  StopHistoryInterval StopHistoryInterval::operator++(int)
131  {
132  StopHistoryInterval result(*this);
133  operator++();
134  return result;
135  }
136 
137  StopHistoryInterval &StopHistoryInterval::operator--()
138  {
139  if(__point_i==0) throw Core::Error::Runtime(
140  "Attempting to go before the beginning of a "
141  "StopHistoryInterval."
142  );
143  --__point_i;
144  retreat_iterator_set(__age_i, __stop_cond_i, __stop_deriv_i);
145  return *this;
146  }
147 
148  StopHistoryInterval StopHistoryInterval::operator--(int)
149  {
150  StopHistoryInterval result(*this);
151  operator--();
152  return result;
153  }
154 
155  StopHistoryInterval &StopHistoryInterval::operator<<(size_t n)
156  {
157  for(size_t i=0; i<n; i++) {
158  retreat_iterator_set(__first_age, __first_stop_cond,
159  __first_stop_deriv);
160  retreat_iterator_set(__age_i, __stop_cond_i, __stop_deriv_i);
161  retreat_iterator_set(__last_age, __last_stop_cond,__last_stop_deriv);
162  }
163  return *this;
164  }
165 
166  StopHistoryInterval &StopHistoryInterval::operator>>(size_t n)
167  {
168  for(size_t i=0; i<n; i++) {
169  advance_iterator_set(__last_age, __last_stop_cond, __last_stop_deriv);
170  advance_iterator_set(__age_i, __stop_cond_i, __stop_deriv_i);
171  advance_iterator_set(__first_age, __first_stop_cond, __first_stop_deriv);
172  }
173  return *this;
174  }

176  StopHistoryInterval &StopHistoryInterval::operator=(
177  const StopHistoryInterval &rhs)
178  {
179  __num_points=rhs.__num_points;
180  __point_i=rhs.__point_i;
181  __first_age=rhs.__first_age;
182  __last_age=rhs.__last_age;
183  __history_age_end=rhs.__history_age_end;
184  __discarded_age_begin=rhs.__discarded_age_begin;
185  __age_i=rhs.__age_i;
186  __first_stop_cond=rhs.__first_stop_cond;
187  __last_stop_cond=rhs.__last_stop_cond;
188  __stop_cond_history_end=rhs.__stop_cond_history_end;
189  __stop_cond_discarded_begin=rhs.__stop_cond_discarded_begin;
190  __stop_cond_i=rhs.__stop_cond_i;
191  __first_stop_deriv=rhs.__first_stop_deriv;
192  __last_stop_deriv=rhs.__last_stop_deriv;
193  __stop_deriv_history_end=rhs.__stop_deriv_history_end;
194  __stop_deriv_discarded_begin=rhs.__stop_deriv_discarded_begin;
195  __stop_deriv_i=rhs.__stop_deriv_i;
196  return *this;
197  }

199  bool StopHistoryInterval::operator==(const StopHistoryInterval &rhs)
200  {
201  return __num_points==rhs.__num_points &&
202  __point_i==rhs.__point_i &&
203  __first_age==rhs.__first_age &&
204  __last_age==rhs.__last_age &&
205  __history_age_end==rhs.__history_age_end &&
206  __discarded_age_begin==rhs.__discarded_age_begin &&
207  __age_i==rhs.__age_i &&
208  __first_stop_cond==rhs.__first_stop_cond &&
209  __last_stop_cond==rhs.__last_stop_cond &&
210  __stop_cond_history_end==rhs.__stop_cond_history_end &&
211  __stop_cond_discarded_begin==rhs.__stop_cond_discarded_begin &&
212  __stop_cond_i==rhs.__stop_cond_i &&
213  __first_stop_deriv==rhs.__first_stop_deriv &&
214  __last_stop_deriv==rhs.__last_stop_deriv &&
215  __stop_deriv_history_end==rhs.__stop_deriv_history_end &&
216  __stop_deriv_discarded_begin==rhs.__stop_deriv_discarded_begin &&
217  __stop_deriv_i==rhs.__stop_deriv_i;
218  }
219 
220  void StopHistoryInterval::grow_left(size_t n)
221  {
222  __num_points+=n;
223  for(size_t i=0; i<n; i++) {
224  retreat_iterator_set(__first_age, __first_stop_cond,
225  __first_stop_deriv);
226  retreat_iterator_set(__age_i, __stop_cond_i, __stop_deriv_i);
227  }
228  }
229 
230  void StopHistoryInterval::grow_right(size_t n)
231  {
232  __num_points+=n;
233  for(size_t i=0; i<n; i++)
234  advance_iterator_set(__last_age, __last_stop_cond,__last_stop_deriv);
235  }
236 
237  std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &os, StopHistoryInterval interval)
238  {
239  return os;
240  std::streamsize orig_precision=os.precision();
241  std::ios_base::fmtflags orig_flags=os.flags();
242  os.setf(std::ios_base::scientific);
243  os.precision(16);
244  os << std::endl;
245  size_t current_index=interval.current_point_index();
246  os << std::setw(20) << "Age:";
247  for(interval.reset(); !interval.end(); interval++) {
248  if(current_index==interval.current_point_index())
249  os << "|";
250  os << std::setw(25) << interval.age();
251  if(current_index==interval.current_point_index())
252  os << "|";
253  }
254  os << std::endl;
255  for(size_t cond_ind=0; cond_ind<interval.number_conditions();
256  cond_ind++) {
257  os << std::setw(13) << "Condition[" << std::setw(5)
258  << cond_ind << "]:";
259  for(interval.reset(); !interval.end(); interval++) {
260  if(current_index==interval.current_point_index())
261  os << "|";
262  os << std::setw(25)
263  << interval.stop_condition_value(cond_ind);
264  if(current_index==interval.current_point_index())
265  os << "|";
266  }
267  os << std::endl;
268  os << std::setw(13) << "Derivative[" << std::setw(5)
269  << cond_ind << "]:";
270  for(interval.reset(); !interval.end(); interval++) {
271  if(current_index==interval.current_point_index())
272  os << "|";
273  os << std::setw(25) << interval.stop_condition_deriv(cond_ind);
274  if(current_index==interval.current_point_index())
275  os << "|";
276  }
277  os << std::endl;
278  }
279  os.precision(orig_precision);
280  os.flags(orig_flags);
281  return os;
282  }
